participant_1.background:
My students are my favorite people because they make me laugh and smile every day.
I love the suburbs because I have more space for my family and our movie collection.
i am 29 years old.
I use my laptop to work on lessons while I'm at the park.
I love to spend time with my cat, especially when I'm feeling stressed from school.

participant_2.background:
I overanalyze things and dwell on small mistakes.
my parents live across the street from me.
I'm going to a local Christmas concert with my friend, even though I can't sing very well.
I'm always looking for ways to make my home cooking more exciting, and I love trying new recipes.
i love to tell jokes.

content.text: Hello there! What are you up to?
Not much, just working on some lesson plans. My students are my favorite people.
That's great! What grade do you teach?
I teach high school. It can be a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
I can imagine! What's your favorite subject to teach?
I love teaching English. I love reading and writing, and I love helping students learn to love those things too.
That's awesome! I love reading too. I'm going to a Christmas concert with my friend tonight, even though I can't sing very well.
That sounds like fun! Do you sing in the concert?
No, I'm just going to listen. I love listening to music.
That's great. I love music too. I'm always looking for new ways to make my home cooking more exciting. Do you like to cook?
I love to cook! I'm always trying new recipes. I love trying new things.
That's great! I love to try new things too. I think it's important to keep an open mind and try new things.
I agree! I think it's important to have fun and try new things.
I think so too! It's the best way to live life.
